description: Number of matrices with n columns whose rows do not cover each other; ordered antichains of subsets of an n-set.
references: V. Jovovic and G. Kilibarda, On the number of Boolean functions in the Post classes F^{mu}_8, Diskretnaya Matematika, 11 (1999), no. 4, 127-138 (translated in Discrete Mathematics and Applications, 9, (1999), no. 6)
V. Jovovic, G. Kilibarda, On enumeration of the class of all monotone Boolean functions, in preparation.
links: Index entries for sequences related to Boolean functions
formula: a(n)=Sum_{k=0..C(n, floor(n/2))}k!*M(n, k) where M(n, k) is the number of distinct monotone Boolean functions of n variables with k mincuts.
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Goran Kilibarda, Jul 23 2000
